channel.title: Personal on Arun Mitra
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Arun Mitra

item.title: Hello World! - My First Blog Post
item.description: Little over an year ago I decided to build a personal web space where I can document, archive & organise my work, and possibly share it with others. Since I have no formal training anything remotely related to IT or web development, it proved to be quite a bit of a challenge. There are three steps in my approach. I am going to briefly describe them on the following blog post.
